channel.title: Posts on (with poetry)
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on (with poetry)

item.title: I told Mike
item.description: I told Mike I would make him a website. He better drink German beer with me Sunday. Or any day for that matter. By the way, it’s only three hours of your life.

item.description: This is a post. Enjoy it.
